name: asl-tab
description: Loads a random, short American Sign Language (ASL) instructional video in new tabs. Videos from Dr. Bill Vicars of LifePrint/ASLU.

scripts.package: rm -f dist.zip && zip -r dist.zip manifest.json icons newTab.html newTab.css newTab.js

author: Matsuko Friedland <info@matsuko.ca> (https://matsuko.ca)
